name: CarbLoader
description:
CarbLoader: A bread delivery game by Chris Parlette

You are a bread delivery driver trying to complete the requested deliveries as fast as possible.  Once you have 10 incomplete jobs at once, the game is over!

Jobs will appear on the right, showing the amount of bread, type of bread, and delivery location.

Pick up bread at the bread factory in the upper left.  Once at the factory, you can load up your truck, or empty it out.  You have a limited amount of space on your truck, so load it wisely!

Once you have the requested amount of bread, drive to the corresponding house to deliver it.  Good luck!

All programming, assets, sound, music, and graphics are original by Chris Parlette.

This was originally made for Godot Wild Jam 26.  The chosen theme was 'bread'.
